title: "Hollywood to ‘replace’ movie extras with AI as studios start using ‘full body scans’"
excerpt: "Movie extras may be out of work soon with a looming danger of being replaced by AI in blockbusters. Those who feature in the background of the world’s biggest films could be out of a job with Hollywood already starting to use “full body scans” to turn them into digital versions of themselves."
